main.name: Arvi Rizqi Fadhila
main.description: Hi, I am a university student with a strong interest in web development, particularly frontend development, as well as machine learning. I enjoy building interactive and responsive user interfaces while also exploring how data and algorithms can be leveraged to create intelligent solutions.
main.bio: I’m a computer science student with a strong passion for web development, especially frontend engineering, and a growing interest in machine learning. I love crafting clean, responsive user interfaces and exploring how smart systems can be built using data and algorithms. I’m always eager to learn new tools, improve my technical skills, and stay current with the latest tech trends.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Ketika menempuh pendidikan di SMK, saya berkesempatan mengikuti Lomba Kompetensi Siswa (LKS) pada bidang Web Development. Pada tahun 2020, saya mewakili sekolah di tingkat Kabupaten Sragen dan berhasil meraih juara 3. Meskipun sertifikatnya kini sudah tidak ada, pengalaman tersebut sangat berharga bagi saya.
